text: Pen yad gelɨgɨpin adek ak, nɨb nepɨm. Klays nop takaw ak ma dɨl, based sɨkop takaw ak dɨl, kɨles yɨbɨl gelɨgɨpin. Bɨ Juda yad ayɨp jɨmñɨl awl gɨnok okok, kɨlop ned gɨl, based sɨkop ned gelɨgɨpal ak yad kɨles gɨl delɨgɨpin. Bɨ Juda gos kɨli pal ak kɨdek gɨl, Klays binɨb ne okok kɨlop gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨl, ñag paklɨnɨg gelɨgɨpin.
